1429240.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Old World Regional Map Pack
1429240.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Old World Regional Map Pack

The Old World Regional Map Pack features hand-drawn images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This art package allows for the creation of a traditional take on regional and world maps on parchment or old paper.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Parchment base background image and 6 premade maps of regional areas with an assortment of coasts, forests, mountain ranges, and more
  • brushes (river brush)
  • Decorations including many mountains and mountain ranges, hills, forests, structures, and more
  • effects for stained texture overlays to add a new level of detail to your parchment style maps
  • tiles for creating waterways and coasts
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
